name: MetaCert
tag_list: family-safety, semantic-web, browser, search, certification, content-classification, content-labeling
overview:
MetaCert is a United States registered corporation with its head office located in San Francisco and its EMEA head office located in Dublin, Ireland. Following more than 6 years of research and development, the company was listed early in 2011.

The primary business of MetaCert is to help consumers find out more information about the content on a website and where appropriate, its suitability, before visiting a site.

It has built the largest data sate of adult content worldwide - it has indexed more than half a billion adult webpages to help protect families from inappropriate content on the Web.

MetaSurf is the first product launched by the company. Based on the Semantic Web, it is a browser extension that helps parents to block more than half a billion adult webpages.

funding_rounds.source_description: Metacert Raises $740K to Rid the Web of Porn, If You Want It To
